author: lundblad
msg: On wc-propcaching branch: Add a flag to the entries file keeping track of
whether properties were modified or not.  Keep this flag updated and
use it to determined whether properties are modified.  Add lots of TODO
NOTE: This commit breaks stat_tests 13, which tests thats certain properties
(pun partly intended;) of property timestamps.  This has to be resolved.
(svn_wc_props_modified_p): Use flag in the entry if wc format is new enough;
else fall back to the old method.
(svn_wc__loggy_entry_modify): Add prop_mods flag to the hash.

author: kon
msg: Ensure svn-status-temp-dir ends with a slash on XEmacs.
Without this change, svn-status-temp-arg-file could become e.g.
The same applies to other temporary files as well.
(svn-status-temp-dir): On XEmacs, append a slash to the result

author: sussman
msg: Delete this branch, we're done with it.

author: rooneg
msg: Partial fix for Issue #443: post-commit hook script (error) output lost
This is step 6 : Pass the post-commit error from the server to the client
(svn_commit_info_dup): Modified to copy the post_commit_err member.
(dav_svn__merge_response): Modified to use the new post-commit
(dav_svn_merge): Modified to extract the post-commit error message.
(svn_cl__print_commit_info): At last, we can print out the post-commit
(post_commit_hook_test): New function to test post-commit hook's error
(test_list): Added post_commit_hook_test to list of tests.
(close_edit): Fill the post_commit_err parameter if the child
(ra_svn_end_commit): Modified to read the extra post-commit error
message sent out by the server.
(commit_info): Added the optional parameter for post-commit error.
(merge_elements): Added new member for post-commit error processing.
(merge_ctx_t): Added new member for post-commit error.
(svn_ra_dav__merge_activity): Added new parameter for post-commit error
(commit_callback_baton_t): Add a new member to hold the post-commit
(commit_done): Modified to copy the over the post-commit error message
(commit): Write out the tuple with the post-commit error message.

author: malcolm
msg: Followup to r17180: update missed caller of svn_wc_create_tmp_file2().
(svn_wc_create_tmp_file): Update function arguments to match changes
made in r17180: pass in an svn_io_file_del_t constant, not a boolean.
